channel.title: Dave's linkblog feed
channel.description: My linkblog has been around in various locations for many years.

item.description: Scarlett Johansson says lawyers got OpenAI to shut down "Her" voice.
item.source:markdown: Scarlett Johansson says lawyers got OpenAI to shut down "Her" voice.

item.description: Trump choosing not to testify in his own defense should be a banner headline.
item.source:markdown: Trump choosing not to testify in his own defense should be a banner headline.

item.description: Kingsley Uyi Idehen, working with ChatGPT, has a simple feed reader, using my blog's feed as an example.
item.source:markdown: Kingsley Uyi Idehen, working with ChatGPT, has a simple feed reader, using my blog's feed as an example.

item.description: Cheez-It Opened the Cheez-In Diner in Woodstock, New York.
item.source:markdown: Cheez-It Opened the Cheez-In Diner in Woodstock, New York.

item.description: Knicks 'gave everything they had,' come up short in Game 7.
item.source:markdown: Knicks 'gave everything they had,' come up short in Game 7.

item.description: Yes Apple is a soul crushing tech monopoly. And some group inside Apple did something creative that inspired debate and for some revulsion, and in the name of uniformity in artistic expression, the creativity was crushed. And Steve Jobs would’ve loved it, btw, imho.
item.source:markdown: Yes Apple is a soul crushing tech monopoly. And some group inside Apple did something creative that inspired debate and for some revulsion, and in the name of uniformity in artistic expression, the creativity was crushed. And Steve Jobs would’ve loved it, btw, imho.

item.description: As clicks dry up for news sites, could Apple News be a lifeline?
item.source:markdown: As clicks dry up for news sites, could Apple News be a lifeline?

item.description: Despite being defeated, the Knicks received a standing ovation in the game’s final seconds — a token of appreciation from a loyal fanbase that enjoyed one of the most memorable playoff runs in team history.
item.source:markdown: Despite being defeated, the Knicks received a standing ovation in the game’s final seconds — a token of appreciation from a loyal fanbase that enjoyed one of the most memorable playoff runs in team history.

item.description: Jalen Brunson breaks hand as Pacers dump Knicks out of NBA playoffs in Game 7.
item.source:markdown: Jalen Brunson breaks hand as Pacers dump Knicks out of NBA playoffs in Game 7.

item.description: Three Laws of Robotics. I realize a lot of people may not know of these laws. Probably would be a good idea to get buy-in from the major vendors.
item.source:markdown: Three Laws of Robotics. I realize a lot of people may not know of these laws. Probably would be a good idea to get buy-in from the major vendors.

item.description: Open the pod bay doors HAL.
item.source:markdown: Open the pod bay doors HAL.

item.description: I want a simple Hello World app for ChatGPT in the browser, or Node.js. So I asked ChatGPT to write it for me.
item.source:markdown: I want a simple Hello World app for ChatGPT in the browser, or Node.js. So I asked ChatGPT to write it for me.

item.description: This Year's Google I/O Was the Most Boring Ever.

item.description: George Harrison's Pirate Song Rutland Weekend Television.
item.source:markdown: George Harrison's Pirate Song Rutland Weekend Television.

item.description: Perplexity.ai is a competitor of ChatGPT. I asked about RSS and the NY Times role in RSS. This is a good test, because most reporters leave the NYT out of the story.
item.source:markdown: [Perplexity.ai](http://Perplexity.ai) is a competitor of ChatGPT. I asked about RSS and the NY Times role in RSS. This is a good test, because most reporters leave the NYT out of the story.

item.description: Stephen Wolfram on chatgpt. Why it's good at conversation but not at science. The agrees with what I've seen. But it's very useful at telling you what other humans do in situations like the one you describe.
item.source:markdown: Stephen Wolfram on chatgpt. Why it's good at conversation but not at science. The agrees with what I've seen. But it's very useful at telling you what other humans do in situations like the one you describe.

item.description: "The United States is a big-hearted idea." (Quoting myself again!)
item.source:markdown: "The United States is a big-hearted idea." (Quoting myself again!)

item.description: Tracing the Long, Winding Path of an Ancient Roman Aqueduct.
item.source:markdown: Tracing the Long, Winding Path of an Ancient Roman Aqueduct.

item.description: Go NY Go: Behind the song pumping up the Knicks' Garden.
item.source:markdown: Go NY Go: Behind the song pumping up the Knicks' Garden.

item.description: I was really angry when the NYT fired Donald McNeil, who had done so much to keep us informed about Covid. If that's what the NYT isn't going to do, going forward, I'm all for it.
item.source:markdown: I was really angry when the NYT fired Donald McNeil, who had done so much to keep us informed about Covid. If that's what the NYT isn't going to do, going forward, I'm all for it.

item.description: At 69, Gayle King Is the Cover Star of Sport Illustrated’s Swimsuit Issue.
item.source:markdown: At 69, Gayle King Is the Cover Star of Sport Illustrated’s Swimsuit Issue.

item.description: The Knicks epic fart has become famous. It could get kind of interesting on the court at tonight's game.
item.source:markdown: The Knicks epic fart has become famous. It could get kind of interesting on the court at tonight's game.

item.description: Evan Williams has started a new social network called Maven. Unfortunately the only story about it I could find is behind a paywall.
item.source:markdown: Evan Williams has started a new social network called Maven. Unfortunately the only story about it I could find is behind a paywall.

item.description: An 'epic fart' helped get Knicks ready for Game 5 rout of Pacers.
item.source:markdown: An 'epic fart' helped get Knicks ready for Game 5 rout of Pacers.

item.source:markdown: Supreme Court Justice Alito’s House Displayed a ‘Stop the Steal’ Flag After Jan. 6.

item.source:markdown: Tesla must face fraud suit for claiming its cars could fully drive themselves.

item.description: Dan Rather interviews Ringo Starr.

item.description: If you subscribe to my feed you should also subscribe to Ben Werdmuller. I'm interested in every one of his posts, so I guess you would be too.
item.source:markdown: If you subscribe to my feed you should also subscribe to Ben Werdmuller. I'm interested in every one of his posts, so I guess you would be too.

item.description: I now have a "gravatar" that's consistent with the favicon for all my sites.

item.description: A friend from Calif is visiting NYC in July. I used ChatGPT for ideas about where to stay and where to visit for food and entertainment. This is far in advance of what we had before AI.
item.source:markdown: A friend from Calif is visiting NYC in July. I used ChatGPT for ideas about where to stay and where to visit for food and entertainment. This is far in advance of what we had before AI.

item.description: I had a few extra minutes to spare, so I wrote a script to string together all the 550-character-wide pictures that have appeared on my blog.

item.description: AI is going to solve the local news problem long before hiring more reporters will.
